actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding controls by certain European countries on chemicals that are used in the processing of illegal drugs.

summary.text: Urges: (1) the European Community's Council of Ministers issue a directive to impose controls as strict as those in U.S. law on precursor and essential chemicals used in the production of clandestinely produced drugs; and (2) England, Finland, France, Holland, Italy, Spain, and West Germany to work with the Drug Enforcement Administration and the International Narcotics Control Board to enact laws as strong as the U.S. chemical diversion laws.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding controls by certain European countries on chemicals that are used in the processing of illegal drugs.
